title: Store Supervisor
tagsAndSkills: Store Supervision,Store Keeping,Stores Maintenance,Stores,Store Management,Material Control,Store Audit,Stock Register
jobDescription:
Designation Store Supervisor

Job Location - Asmita House, Naya Nagar, Mira Road, Mumbai - 401107

Shift - Mon to Sat

Company Website www.asmitagroup.com


About Us:

Established in 1985 by Saiyad Muzaffar Hussain, AsmitA Group is a dynamic conglomerate boasting a legacy of trust and excellence. With a primary focus on real estate, we've crafted thriving communities for over 2700 families in Mira Road, where our name resonates with quality, innovation, and unparalleled customer satisfaction. Our portfolio includes 60 residential and numerous commercial buildings, reflecting our commitment to shaping vibrant spaces.


Beyond real estate, AsmitA Group extends its reach to AsmitA Club, a premier fitness destination offering a spectrum of recreational facilities. From outdoor swimming to invigorating ice baths, sauna retreats to dynamic fitness regimes, our club caters to diverse wellness needs.


Venturing beyond Mira Road, we proudly steward AsmitA Organic Farms in Nagpur, India. Our farm stands as a beacon of sustainable agriculture, cultivating a rich assortment of organic delights from pure ghee to aromatic spices, nourishing millets, and beyond. Committed to purity, our products bear the hallmark of organic certification in both India and the United States, a testament to our unwavering dedication to quality and authenticity.


At AsmitA Organic Farms, every harvest is a testament to the enduring bond between our farmers and the land. Rigorous inspection processes ensure adherence to the highest organic standards, underscoring our reverence for nature's bounty and the tireless devotion of those who nurture it. Join us on our journey to redefine organic living, whether online or at local farmer markets, where every purchase resonates with pride and purity.


WHAT WE NEED:

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Store Keeper to join our team. As a Store Keeper, you will be responsible for keeping track and records of all inventories within the store and operations ranging from ordering, stocking in and managing the inventory. The experts make sure all store related items are maintained.


Job Description:

  • Record the store material receipt and consumption on a daily basis.
  • Checking the stock as per records.
  • Receiving materials, stocking, recording of receipts, assisting J.E. to prepare quality reports of the received materials.
  • Issue materials as per the indent for different works.
  • General supervision on the site regarding wastage of material, improper use of material etc.
  • Recollecting any balance/ unused materials at the end of the working days.
  • Update records on display boards and display slates regarding the stock.
  • Prepare fortnightly/ monthly consumption reports jointly with the junior engineers.
  • Prepare a list of excess material.
  • Update the stocks periodically.
  • Inform the concerned engineer of the status of balance material in order to raise further indent.
  • Follow up with material suppliers, with prior consent from the purchase department, to ensure timely supply.
  • Maintain the store neat and tidy.
  • Maintain record of cash purchase.
  • Maintain records of electricity and water bills.

Qualification & Experience:

  • Prior experience of 7-10 years as store experience.
  • Diploma / Bachelor's degree in any field.
  • Prior experience in stock management.

Skills Required:

  • Knowledge of construction material.
  • Ability to analyze data.
  • Should be result oriented & should be very good with organizational skills.
  • Average computer knowledge.
  • Good Communication skills.

title: Senior Incident Manager
tagsAndSkills: Incident Management,Mim,incident manager,major incident,Major Incident Management,Critical Incident Management,Senior,Management
jobDescription:
Job Description:


The primary responsibility of the position, ensure the monitoring team is managed and governed to minimize the incidents on the uPPi platform. Key metrics for role is to ensure zero incident or incident free UPI platform
due to lack of governance. Incident Manager will also be responsible for creating shifts for Incident and
Monitoring teams to ensure 24*7 support is available for real time monitoring and troubleshooting of any
incident with recovery in set SLA with the client.


Responsibilities:


Gather details from respective Service Operations and Service Monitoring teams, create detailed
ITSM/ITIL process documentation, maintenance of the Document Repository . Working at all levels
from process policy documentation to work instructions and user guides and documentation at each
level.
Responsible for the Incident management team which in turn is responsible for documentation of the
ITSM Process integration across processes on the UPI platform.
Creating , developing and improving required documentation such as process flow diagrams, process
detailed documentations , roles/responsibilities, presentations, gap analysis reports etc .
Ensuring ITSM process tickets related deliverables to Application Support team and Infrastructure
management team are complete, consistent, high quality, on time and deliver valued outcomes
Understands incident severity and ensures the team responds in quick time to get all stakeholders in
Incident call. Is able to drive the call by asking and coordinating with various team leads of infra team
and OEM to respond and ensure incident resolution is arrived at and impact to the UPI system is
minimal both from TD and customer inconvenience perspective..
Supports Operation Management for timely RCA submission to the bank team.
Collaborate and document ITSM/ITIL processes best practices and standards and integrate learnings
from Incident.
Contribute to Operation Managers on the analysis and recommendations for ITSM Process and
governance..
Direct reporting to Infra head and ensure SLA compliance of incidents on the UPI Platform...
Requirements and skills:
Solid experience in requirements gathering from Service Operation and Service Monitoring teams
and converting them into detailed process documentation with workflows. Experience in Dynatrace is
preferred.
Good understanding of ITIL concepts and its application to real life business scenarios. Experience in
BMC remedy is preferred.
Excellent communication skills (both written and verbal) with strong presentation and documentation
skills (proficiency in Visio, Word and PowerPoint), Visio for defining and designing highly complex
Process Swim-lanes diagrams
Hands-on experience in detailed documentation of ITIL processes for at least 2 Global/ Large scale
projects
Must have experience of supporting Service Operation Teams in driving process re-design ,
documenting & maintaining the library of process documents and helps to implement these into
ITSM platforms.
Is committed to customer satisfaction and ensures that actions contribute towards a positive
experience by the customer.
Strong interpersonal skills, customer centric attitude, ability to deal with cultural diversity
Proven team player and ability to handle pressure and drive production calls till resolution.
Experienced at handling large teams in 23*7 operations is a must.

title: Senior Manager - Corporate Finance & Business Strategy
tagsAndSkills: Business Strategy,Corporate Finance,Excel,Financial Modelling,Financial Analysis,MS Office,Powerpoint,Senior

placeholders.label: Mumbai Suburbs, Navi Mumbai, Mumbai (All Areas)

jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities

Finance:

- Assisting the entire business planning effort of the Company, including defining & critiquing our short-term & long-term strategic vision; outlining, monitoring & assessing performance/growth/efficiency metrics of all our business verticals; and conducting forecasting exercises & financial analyses for the entire Company.

- Preparing information memoranda and other presentation materials for internal meetings and deal negotiations

- Analyzing financial statements, company performance metrics, and industry benchmarks to provide insights and support decision-making


Investor Relations:

- Preparing monthly investor update materials

- Preparing interaction materials for prospective investors including business plans and company presentations

- Coordinating with internal teams, and external agencies for due diligence matters


Business Strategy:

- Preparing market entry plans for new micro/macro markets

- Preparing and maintaining regulatory materials for prospective market entries in in line with local regulations


Core Requirements:

- Work experience of 4+ years, ideally within investment banking, management consulting and/or private equity

- Education at a top-tier university/college will be a plus

- Extreme attention to detail

- Excellent Excel modelling skills, and ability to handle large data sets

- Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills

- Ability to think creatively and support decisions analytically

- Strong work ethic and discipline

- Paranoia for organization, timeliness, and optimization

- Passion for entrepreneurship and top-quality Residential Real Estate

title: Sales Manager
tagsAndSkills: Manage Client Relationships,Prospect New Client,Communication Skills,Present and Pitch,Collaborate with Teams,Sales Reporting,Market Research,Develop Sales Plans
jobDescription:
Key Responsibilities:

  1. Client Acquisition and Retention:
    • Prospect New Clients: Identify and reach out to potential clients through networking, cold calling, and attending industry events.
    • Manage Client Relationships: Build and maintain strong relationships with existing clients, ensuring their needs are met and exceeded.
  2. Sales Strategy and Execution:
    • Develop Sales Plans: Create strategies to meet sales targets and drive revenue growth.
    • Present and Pitch: Prepare and deliver compelling presentations and pitches to prospective clients.
  3. Campaign Management:
    • Collaborate with Teams: Work with creative, media, and strategic teams to develop tailored advertising solutions.
    • Oversee Campaigns: Ensure that campaigns are executed effectively and meet client expectations.
  4. Market Research:
    • Analyze Trends: Stay updated on industry trends, market conditions, and competitor activities.
    • Provide Insights: Use research to inform sales strategies and client recommendations.
  5. Sales Reporting:
    • Track Performance: Monitor sales performance and prepare reports for management.
    • Adjust Strategies: Use data to refine sales tactics and improve results.

Skills and Qualities:

  • Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills to effectively pitch ideas and negotiate deals.
  • Networking: Ability to build and leverage a network of contacts within the industry.
  • Sales Acumen: Understanding of sales processes and techniques, with a focus on closing deals.
  • Client-Focused: A keen sense of client needs and the ability to deliver solutions that meet those needs.
  • Organizational Skills: Ability to manage multiple clients and projects simultaneously, with attention to detail.

Tools and Technologies:

  • CRM Systems: Familiarity with customer relationship management software to track client interactions and sales progress.
  • Presentation Software: Proficiency in tools like PowerPoint for creating presentations.
  • Analytics Tools: Knowledge of tools that provide insights into market trends and campaign performance.
